rp_2_restate_one_and_one.text: I’d like one meat, one veggie, and I don’t want a drink.

rp_3_remember_gluten.text: Wait a minute, now that I think about it, last time I had pizza, I had a bad reaction.

rp_3_gluten_uncle.text: You know, my uncle had the same problem, it turned out he had a gluten allergy.  Come to think of it, maybe I do too?  Maybe I should just avoid pizza.

rp_3_decided_nogluten.text: A no gluten option?  That totallly works.  I'll get that.

rp_5_intro.text: Hi there.  I've been wondering about this place.  I figured this would be a nice place to try out. By the way, nice uniform you got there.

rp_10_past_reaction_ELIM.text: I got kinda sick last time I had pizza.  I'm not sure what happened, but today I saw your store, and I thought I'd give pizza another try.

rp_10_greet.text: Hi! This place must be new.  Looks great.

rp_10_first_time.text: This is the first time I've been here.

rp_10_customer_initiates.text: So, I was thinking of getting a slice.

rp_10_store_compliment.text: Yes, this place looks great, and I love the name Pizza Place.

rp_10_insulted.text: Seriously, I'm not sure I like this place or you.

rp_10_rude.text: Seriosuly, is that how you treat your customers?  Anyway, I'd like a slice with no drink, but I can't decide on the topping. What do you suggest?

rp_10_offeredhelp.text: I'd like a slice with no drink, but I can't decide on the topping. What do you suggest?

rp_10_impatient.text: Hello? Are you going to take my order?

rp_10_fed_up.text: No joke, the service here is pathetic. I'm outa here.

rp_10_notgermane.text: I have like no idea what you're talking about.  Are you going to take my order?

rp_10_notgermane_nice.text: I'm not really following you, but are you going to take my order?

rp_10_notgermane_annoyed.text: I have like no idea what you're talking about.  Are you going to take my order?

rp_20_asked_twice.text: Like I said, I do not want a drink, I want a slice.  And I don't know about the toppings.

rp_20_asked_twice_nice.text: Well, I want a slice.  And I don't know about the toppings.

rp_20_asked_twice_annoyed.text: Like I said, I do not want a drink, I want a slice.  And I don't know about the toppings.

rp_20_considering_dog.text: You gotta be joking, no one eats a dog pizza.

rp_20_considering_bird.text: Birds of a feather, flock together, and I will eat that pizza- NEVER!

rp_30_bad_reaction.text: new-audio:Now that I think about it, last time I had pizza, I think I had a bad reaction.

rp_30_time_to_reconsider.text: Now that I think about it, last time I had pizza, I think I had a bad reaction.  I'm suspicious it might be the gluten.

rp_30_remember_gluten.text: Now that I think about it, last time I had pizza, I had a bad reaction.

rp_30_notgermane.text: Well, that’s one way to look at it, now what about my pizza.

rp_30_notgermane_nice.text: Ok, whatever, lets just finish up my order.

rp_30_notgermane_annoyed.text: Well, that’s one way to look at it, now what about my pizza.

rp_30_pizza_bad_idea.text: I dunno.  Maybe pizza is not a great idea after all.

rp_32_nogluten_undecided.text: Ok, whatever, lets just finish up my order.

rp_32_fed_up.text: I guess this was a bad idea.  Thanks for your time.

rp_go_finished_good1.text: Perfect.  I have to say I'm very pleased with the service here! See you next time!

rp_go_finished_good2.text: That's perfect.  You've been so helpful! I'm going to write a great review on Yelp. See you soon!

rp_go_finished_med1.text: Thanks. I felt a bit awkward, but I'm glad we got it sorted all out.

rp_go_finished_med2.text: Thanks. It was a little rough, but I'm glad we worked it out.

rp_go_finished_bad1.text: Finally.  I'd come back next week to see if the health department shut you down.  On second thought, I'm never coming back.

rp_go_finished_bad2.text: About time.  You can tell your manager to look for my ultra negative review on Yelp. Goodbye!

rp_go_finished_bad3.text: Now? Now you get a slice ready? Your customer service was disasterous. You can see yourself on my Instagram page - the worst pizza salesperson in history. SMILE!

rp_go_finished_bad4.text: Um, thank you I guess. I mean seriously, all you had to do was to sell me a slice. How can that be so hard? Isn't that what you do all day long? I truly hope the pizza is way better than your service.

rp_go_finished_bad5.text: Now I know why I haven't had pizza in such a long time - because of incompetent people like you. I mean, all I wanted to do was order a slice. Next time I'm getting frozen.

rp_40_no_drink.text: I've already said that I don't want a drink.  Please read back the order to me.

rp_40_dont_forget.text: Don't forget gluten free.  Please write that down and read it all back to me.

rp_40_write_it.text: Can you please write down my order and repeat it back to me?

rp_40_restate_order.text: How hard can it be?  I want a gluten free slice of sausage and mushroom.  Can you please write it down and read it back to me?
